categories: Category:Star Wars: The Old Republic voice actors

nodes.text: Deborah Kara Unger is a Canadian actress. She was the voice of the SCORPIO artificial intelligence droid in Star Wars: The Old Republic.

Deborah Kara Unger was born in Vancouver, British Columbia, to a mother who was a nuclear specialist and a father who was a gynaecologist. She was the first ever Canadian to be accepted into Australia's Institute of Dramatic Art. Unger now lives in Los Angeles.
